item.title: kzalloc & kmalloc
item.author: yuanye.ma@qq.com (Yuanye Ma)
item.description: kzalloc & kmalloc /* include/linux/slab.h */ /** * kzalloc - allocate memory. The memory is set to zero. * @size: how many bytes of memory are required. * @flags: the type of memory to allocate (see kmalloc). */ static inline void *kzalloc(size_t size, gfp_t flags) { return kmalloc(size, flags | __GFP_ZERO); } /* 调用了 kmalloc此函数在inc
